lines.text:
[talking to summer school teacher]
Sister, if it had been me, I'd have bitten *both* your ankles!

[as Jimmy-John is seen walking down the street without any clothes]
He's stitch-stark naked!
What's that supposed to be?
A woman.
Not a very good likeness...
I had to draw it from memory.

[after Teeny says a short prayer]
Why don't you just say "On your mark, get set, go?"

[after Jane comments on the size of her Christmas present box]
Won't she be surprised if it's an evening gown.

[Everybody looks at him]
So shoot me.

[to the dog after the kids give an anonymous vote]
It was anonymous eh? Who did you vote for?

[about being bounced between school and the hospital so much]
The only thing I ever learned to read was a thermometer.

[after Jimmy-John asks if he can ask the other kids if he can stay]
I hope you've got a good lawyer.

[while exercising Jimmy's ankles]
Do you want to go around walking on your toes the rest of your life?

[In pain]
If you keep that up I'll be walking on my knees!
[repeated line]
Bon soir!

[Trying to get past a boy and Jane eating donuts on a crowded staircase]
I hate to come between you and the donuts, but that's life.
Sir, are you married?
Sometimes I wonder.
Say Tim.
Sorry, I don't dance.

[as raft self inflates under his desk and he's trying to hold it down]
I'm holding down more than I can handle as it is.

[asked what she's doing as she's spanking Jimmy John]
Something I should've done a long time ago.
[lets him up]
I'M GETTING OUT OF HERE!
Go right ahead.
I NEVER SHOULD'VE ASKED YOU TO LET ME STAY HERE, I'M GETTING OUT OF HERE AND GOING SOMEWHERE I CAN DO WHAT I WANT.

[stands up]
Go right ahead, but leave behind everything we've EVER given you.
[to the dog]
And you get out of the way.

[going after Jimmy John on his pre-dawn merit badge hike]
I've never got a badge for anything in my life in the middle of the night!
